query:
SELECT id, requestNumber, requestType, status, amount, createdAt 
FROM employeeRequests 
WHERE employeeId = 30002 
ORDER BY createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 5;

FROM employeeRequests 
WHERE employeeId = 30002 
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
